dict.acceptation: （感到不能）对付；（明知不好办而）交谈；必须对付（某情况）；面临…；

sent.orig: Each face object has a single glyph slot object that can be accessed as face- >glyph.
sent.trans: 每一个face对象都有一个字形槽对象，可以通过face->glyph来访问。

sent.orig: A voucher of RMB100 for FACE Restaurant will be issued to each order during this promotion.
sent.trans: 促销期间每笔订单将获得一张FACE餐厅的100元用餐代金券。

sent.orig: Animal statues in face of the other dragons, beasts face, face riding birds and baby animals.
sent.trans: 动物石像中的另一类是人面龙、人面兽、人面鸟和骑兽娃娃。

sent.orig: Place mask onto face, gently press mask on face until it fits the face.
sent.trans: 将面膜敷于面部，用手指轻压使其充分贴紧面部。

sent.orig: Face detection technology mainly includes algorithms based on face knowledge, template matching and face learning.
sent.trans: 目前的人脸检测技术主要包括基于知识、模板匹配和基于学习的人脸检测算法。
